commit.message:
Auto merge of #37846 - jseyfried:fix_proc_macro_dep, r=alexcrichton

Fix bug in proc_macro dependency loading

Fixes #37839.
r? @alexcrichton

files.patch:

+#![crate_type = "proc-macro"]
